response.overview: Friday March 15th 2019 @ Indigo at the O2  The world's most exciting jiu jitsu event returns to indigo at The O2. The card will be packed with the best grapplers from around the world and will feature men's matches, ladies matches, title fights and more.  The event was the fourth the Polaris has hosted at the Indigo at The O2 in London, England. The card was headlined by a catchweight superfight between the multiple-time MMA champion Jake Shields and future Bellator MMA Middleweight Champion and grappling champion Rafael Lovato Jr.[10][11]  In the co-featured slot, for inaugural the Polaris Women Under 55KG Championship a bout between IBJJF(2018) champion Ffion Davies and IBJJF(2013/2014/2016) champion Gezary Matuda took place.[12]  Bonus awards  The following fighters were awarded bonuses:  Performance of the Night: Ffion Davies  Submission of the Night: Ethan Crelinsten
response.title: Polaris 9
